capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid does look pretty tall for a half-giant, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him towering over the rest of us in the Great Hall. It's one thing to hear about someone being tall, but it's another thing entirely when you see them standing right in front of you!
I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. The way he moves with that long stride of his is quite intimidating, isn't it?

I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. That's what I mean when I said he looks surprisingly tall - it's not just that he's big, but actually, he's taller than most people I know.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. you're a character who is surprisingly tall.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He's got a special way with them, and it's really endearing to see him care for them so deeply. I mean, who wouldn't want a pet hippogriff or a giant owl? It's just one of the many things that makes Hagrid such a unique and lovable character in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. valeria is a character who has pets.
